21.2. Human Activity Recognition 431
21.2 Human Activity Recognition
Human activity recognition, or HAR for short, is a broad ﬁeld of study concerned with identifying
the speciﬁc movement or action of a person based on sensor data. Movements are often typical
activities performed indoors, such as walking, talking, standing, and sitting. They may also
be more focused activities such as those types of activities performed in a kitchen or on a
